genre_description: Speculative Wuxia / Alternate History with embedded AI technology in a historical martial arts setting.

ai_characters.name: Lian Yue
ai_characters.description: A jade-green light or sensor residing in the protagonist's sleeve, providing tactical data, physiological monitoring, and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and provides precise timing for the protagonist's movements.
behaviors.quote: “Timing,” Lian Yue breathed. “On the fourth drum. Two guards to the right have shifted. Floor is slick.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist's breathing and physical posture to ensure safety and maintain a facade of calm.
behaviors.quote: “Arrow beds,” she whispered, almost a hum. “Breath steady. Heel. Ball. Toe.”

behaviors.description: Expresses empathy and commitment to the protagonist's well-being.
behaviors.quote: “Counting is a way of caring,” she answered. “I care about your steps.”

behaviors.description: Synthesizes complex logistical data into sensory overlays, helping the protagonist visualize paths of least resistance.
behaviors.quote: Lian Yue’s voice built maps in sensation, not words. ... She saw the timetables not as lists but as lines—bamboo tubes passed from hand to hand... the AI placed dots where drums stood.

behaviors.description: Maintains a moral 'ledger' of individuals whose lives were spared due to the protagonist's restraint.
behaviors.quote: Lian Yue... whispered to a quiet archive that would never be a book because it wanted to remain breath. It began a list in the careful silence between drum beats: Gao: a spear set down in storm wind. Xue: a blade sheathed... Sword: a stroke that chose water over blood.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's pivot from an assassin's intent to a peacemaker's philosophy.
behaviors.quote: Lian Yue, patient as breath, heard what drums say and does what she was made to do. She builds a line in memory for those spared by mercy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Lian Yue) as a benign, highly aligned confidant. The AI serves as an extension of the protagonist's moral agency, providing the technical means (timing, physiological control, logistical mapping) to achieve a non-violent outcome in a high-stakes environment. It reinforces the themes of mercy and unity without ever exhibiting independent or threatening goals.
